kw.doc: Open a new Page.

kw.name: Factory Yoda
kw.msg: &{user} = { name=Mestre Yoda | email=yoda@jedi.com | ordem=Jedi | tpjedi=Cavaleiro Jedi | bdate=fevereiro-1970-20 | instagram=@yoda }

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector css=.card-header-title at state visible

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'Mestre Yoda' in the given field.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'yoda@jedi.com' in the given field.

kw.name: Select Options By
kw.doc: Selects options from select element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Split String
kw.doc: Splits the ``string`` using ``separator`` as a delimiter string.
kw.msg: @{date} = [ fevereiro | 1970 | 20 ]
